Uses of Interface
nux.xom.pool.ResourceResolver

Packages that use ResourceResolver
nux.xom.pool Efficient and flexible pools and factories for Documents, XQueries, and XSL Transforms, as well as Builders that validate against W3C XML Schemas, DTDs, RELAX NG, Schematron, etc. 
 

Uses of ResourceResolver in nux.xom.pool
 

Methods in nux.xom.pool with parameters of type ResourceResolver
 Document DocumentPool.getDocument(ResourceResolver resolver, String resourceName, URI baseURI)
          Returns a document for the input stream obtained from resolving the given resourceName against the given resolver.
 XSLTransform XSLTransformPool.getTransform(ResourceResolver resolver, String resourceName, URI baseURI)
          Returns an XSLTransform for the input stream obtained from resolving the given resourceName against the given resolver.
 XQuery XQueryPool.getXQuery(ResourceResolver resolver, String resourceName, URI baseURI)
          Returns an XQuery for the input stream obtained from resolving the given resourceName against the given resolver.
